summary: A retex for the steel sword in order to make it look like the Sword of Aeons from Fable along with a mesh changer for the Nightingale Blade
descriptionHtml:
NOTICE: Remember to download my Jack of Blades Nightingale Retex to go alongside this mod!
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1479

The Sword of Aeons is found at the center of the plot in the first Fable and is the most powerful weapon in that game. I\'ve tried to keep to original as much as I can. The blade is black, the handle is red with gold studs and the hilt bears the Guild Seal, complete with bump mapping :)

There are two files up for download: One is a retex for the steel sword and changes its appearance to that of the Sword of Aeons. The other replaces the mesh of the Nightingale sword with that of the steel sword. By installing them both, the Nightingale sword will end up looking like the Sword of Aeons.

Enjoy :)
author: BurntBiscuits
